# File lib/bundler/vendor/thor/shell/basic.rb, line 37
      def say(message="", color=nil, force_new_line=(message.to_s !~ /( |\t)$/))
        message  = message.to_s
        message  = set_color(message, color) if color

        if force_new_line
          $stdout.puts(message)
        else
          $stdout.print(message)
          $stdout.flush
        end
      end
